control.visible: [Window.IsActive(Settings.xml) | ListItem.IsFolder] + ![StringCompare(ListItem.Label,..) | SubString(ListItem.Path,videodb://1/7) | container.content(Movies) | container.content(TVshows) | container.content(Seasons) | container.content(Episodes) | container.content(musicvideos) | container.content(songs) | container.content(addons) | SubString(Container.FolderPath,plugin://,left)]

[Window.IsActive(Settings.xml) | ListItem.IsFolder] + ![StringCompare(ListItem.Label,..) | SubString(ListItem.Path,videodb://1/7) | container.content(Movies) | container.content(TVshows) | container.content(Seasons) | container.content(Episodes) | container.content(musicvideos) | container.content(songs) | container.content(addons) | SubString(Container.FolderPath,plugin://,left)]

control.description: רקע שחור אחורי - מסתיר חלון וידאו על כל המסך
רקע שחור אחורי - מסתיר חלון וידאו על כל המסך

onfocus.condition: !Skin.HasSetting(AutoView) + Window.IsVisible(MyPrograms.xml) + StringCompare(Container.FolderName,Advanced Launcher) + !StringCompare(Container.Viewmode,$LOCALIZE[31010]) + !IntegerGreaterThan(Container.NumItems,13) + [SubString(ListItem.Label,Arcade) | SubString(ListItem.Label,Nintendo) | SubString(ListItem.Label,Sega) | SubString(ListItem.Label,Sony Playstation) | SubString(ListItem.Label,TurboGrafx)] + [[IsEmpty(ListItem.Plot) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Genre) + IsEmpty(ListItem.Art(fanart))]]
